layerItems.description:
OpenEmbedded-Core is a layer containing the core metadata for current versions
of OpenEmbedded. It is distro-less (can build a functional image with
DISTRO = "nodistro") and contains only emulated machine support.
layerItems.name: openembedded-core

layerItems.description: Multimedia related components such as gstreamer, alsa, dvb, etc.
layerItems.name: meta-multimedia

recipes.description: GUPnP is an elegant, object-oriented open source framework for creating UPnP  devices and control points, written in C using GObject and libsoup. The GUPnP API is intended to be easy to use, efficient and flexible. It provides the same set of features as libupnp, but shields the developer from most of UPnP's internals.

recipes.description: Rygel is a home media solution (UPnP AV MediaServer) that allow you to easily share audio, video and pictures to other devices. Additionally, media player software may use Rygel to become a MediaRenderer that may be controlled remotely by a UPnP or DLNA Controller.

recipes.description: The miniUPnP daemon is an UPnP IGD (internet gateway device) which provide NAT traversal services to any UPnP enabled client on the network.

recipes.description: Ogg Vorbis is a high-quality lossy audio codec that is free of intellectual property restrictions. vorbis-tools include some command line applications to use the libraries.
tremor is a fixed point implementation of the vorbis codec.
libavc1394 is a programming interface for the 1394 Trade Association AV/C (Audio/Video Control) Digital Interface Command Set
Audio processing bits of the WebRTC reference implementation
Projucer is used to build and generate support files and build infrastructure for all JUCE supported platforms, including Linux and Embedded Linux.
Projucer is used to build and generate support files and build infrastructure for all JUCE supported platforms, including Linux and Embedded Linux.
libdvbpsi is a simple library designed for decoding and generation of MPEG TS and DVB PSI tables according to standards ISO/IEC 13818 and ITU-T H.222.0.
The MusicBrainz client is a library which can be built into other programs.  The library allows you to access the data held on the MusicBrainz server.

recipes.summary: OpenAL is a cross-platform 3D audio API

library used to read audio CDs, which is able to perform error corrections, hence the name paranoia.

recipes.summary: The squish library (abbreviated to libsquish) is an open source DXT compression library written in C++

recipes.description: SoX is the Swiss Army knife of sound processing tools. It converts audio files among various standard audio file formats and can apply different effects and filters to the audio data.
rtmpdump is a toolkit for RTMP streams. All forms of RTMP are supported, including rtmp://, rtmpt://, rtmpe://, rtmpte://, and rtmps://.
OpenCORE Adaptive Multi Rate (AMR) speech codec library implementation
VisualOn Advanced Audio Coding (AAC) encoder
VisualOn Adaptive Multi Rate Wideband (AMR-WB) encoder

recipes.description: dleyna-core is a library of utility functions that are used by the higher level dLeyna libraries that communicate with DLNA devices, e.g., dleyna-server. In brief, it provides APIs for logging, error, settings and task management and an IPC asbstraction API.
dleyna-renderer is a library for implementing services that allow clients to discover and manipulate Digital Media Renderers. An implementation of such a service for linux is also included.
dleyna-server is a library for implementing services that allow clients to discover, browse and manipulate Digital Media Servers. An implementation of such a service for linux is also included.

recipes.description: GstOpenMAX is a GStreamer plug-in that allows communication with OpenMAX Integration Layer (IL) components. OpenMAX IL is an industry standard that provides an abstraction layer for computer graphics, video, and sound routines.
recipes.summary: GStreamer plug-in for communication with OpenMAX IL components

recipes.description: GStreamer is a multimedia framework for encoding and decoding video and sound. It supports a wide range of formats including mp3, ogg, avi, mpeg and quicktime.

recipes.description: The Portable SDK for UPnP Devices is an SDK for development of UPnP device and control point applications. It consists of the core UPnP protocols along with a UPnP-specific eXtensible Markup Language (XML) parser supporting the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 API and an optional, integrated mini web server for serving UPnP related documents.
Gstreamer Daemon 1.0
recipes.summary: GStreamer framework for controlling audio and video streaming using TCP connection messages

recipes.description: Library for opening, seeking, and decoding opus audio files
libde265 is an open source implementation of the h.265 video codec. It is written from scratch and has a plain C API to enable a simple integration into other software.
OpenH264 is a codec library which supports H.264 encoding and decoding. It is suitable for use in real time applications such as WebRTC.
TinyALSA is a small library to interface with ALSA in the Linux kernel. It is a lightweight alternative to libasound.
Benchmarks and profiling tools for GStreamer
